meta.description: webistom.in :: portfolio website. Alexey Istomin - front-end developer from Moscow, Russia

intro.title: Hello
intro.text: I’m Alex, frontend developer from Moscow, Russia. I like to look for interesting solutions, create impossible with CSS and implement ideas in the form of sites.

about.title: About me
about.firstText: I am a front-end fanatic and UI developer with about 2 years of development experience. I like to create simple, beautiful and convenient sites, and I love what I do.
about.secondText: As a developer, I understand that a perfect UI should look good and work even better. Together with clients, I identify problems and solve them. My goal is to help small and medium-sized projects grow using everything I know about creating and promoting websites.
about.fourthText: All developed sites are responsive and responsive, using the Mobile First approach. I can support Chrome, Opera, Firefox, Safari, Edge. IE can be modified separately.
about.fifthText: I try to do everything that depends on me as quickly as possible. Designed sites often get a green area in Google Speed (90+).
about.place: State University of Humanities and Technology, Orekhovo-Zuyevo
about.project-noref: PostHTML plugin for creating secure links to third-party sites
about.project-lazy: PostHTML plugin for lazy image loading using native technologies
about.project-book: Translation of a book for testing Vue applications into Russian
about.project-nano: An easy-to-use and simple Instagram package that allow you to fetch media content without API and access token

pageFooter.title: Contacts
pageFooter.name: Alexey Istomin
pageFooter.copyright: Alexey Istomin – frontend developer based in Moscow, Russia.
